abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Programmatic Decentralization
            and Competitiveness Structural Adjustment Loan (DESCAL) is
            the second of three single-tranche loans using a
            Programmatic Structural Adjustment Loan instrument to
            support short- and medium- term reforms that advance
            decentralization and economic competitiveness in Peru.  The
            loan reflects an expansion in the overall program to include
            a heavier emphasis on supporting the Government's
            competitiveness agenda. The DESCAL will support efforts to:
            institutionalize the competitiveness agenda and implement
            its regional components; promote exports and trade
            facilitation; improve productivity and the mix and quality
            of Peruvian products; reduce logistics costs and improve
            public services in infrastructure; and improve the
            investment climate by reducing the cost of doing business.
